title: New client crashes laptop

replies.body: It sounds like your pc might be having some hardware failure or overheating, so it could be crashing to prepare itself.  Double check your vents to make sure there's good airflow, and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will work with you to get this fixed up.  See you there!
